summary: Add enhanced PDF/print reporting on the Export Report page (traveller summary table + standard financial statements) with an explicit requirement to not impact the existing DataSync feature.
architectural_notes: Reporting/export changes must not impact or modify the existing DataSync feature/behavior.
known_issues: Current Export PDF report output is not meeting requirements; needs updated table layout/fields and additional report types.

existing_features.title: Update the Export Report UI (Export Report dialog/page) so the default export includes all travellers, while still supporting an explicit “Selected travellers only” mode.

Revise the exported traveller summary table (PDF/print and CSV) to match the requested columns and wording: Traveller Name, Trip Count, Total Amount, Total Payment, Balance, State. Ensure the table is produced for all travellers by default.

Add new report types to the Export Report page: Monthly Report, Profit & Loss Statement, Income Statement, and Expense Statement, generated using standard accounting-style structures based on existing ledger data (income from trips + co-traveller income; expenses from car expenses).
Implement PDF/print generation for the new report types with a clean, printable layout (A4), consistent typography, and page-break behavior suitable for long tables.
Ensure all reporting changes do not impact the existing DataSync feature (sync polling/merge/save behavior and backend app-data persistence).

new_feature_requests.summary: Revamp Export PDF report: include traveller summary table (Traveller Name, Trip Count, Total Amount, Total Payment, Balance, State) listing all travellers by default, with ability to filter/select users if needed.
Add print/export options on Export Report page for standard-format Monthly Report, Profit & Loss Statement, Income Statement, and Expense Statement.

projectName: Revamp Export Report page with improved traveller PDF table and standard financial statements (no DataSync impact)
